original: Forsman, David Johannes, stadskamrer, Borgholm, f. 4/9/16 i Umeå lands-förs., Västerb. I., av Johan F. o. Tekla Forsman. G. 46 m. Gurli Anne-Marie Marklund. — Studrex. i Umeå 38, DSI 43. Tax-.kontr. v. länsstyr. i Umeå 44-45, socialv :as’s’rst. i Arvidsjaur 45, stadskamrer i Borgholm fr. 46.
translated: Forsman, David Johannes, city treasurer, Borgholm, born on September 4th, 1916 in Umeå rural parish, Västerbotten County, Sweden, to Johan F. and Tekla Forsman. Married to Gurli Anne-Marie Marklund in 1946. - Studied at Umeå in 1938 and at DSI in 1943. Worked as a tax contractor for the county government in Umeå from 1944-1945, social welfare assistant in Arvidsjaur in 1945, and city treasurer in Borgholm from 1946 onwards.
